description: An amazing assortment of technical trails just North of Latimer road and lodged in between Myrtle Phillip school and Hwy #11. If you are feeling invincible, you can try "Hand Of Doom". Its the rocky drop at the top that spits you into a couple of shore type stunts that will give you bragging rights with the rest of your buddies that watch. Wear all your armor.
directions: Turn west at the lights on Hwy 99 and Lorimer. You will soon see the entrance (200meters down) off Lorimer at the junction with Nestors Road.
title: Cut Yer Bars
